dmca.title: Notice of Trademark/Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: TradeMark Admin [mailto:TradeMarkAdmin@freelife.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 15, 2007 6:22 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Notice of Trademark/Copyright Infringement

 

May 15, 2007

VIA EMAIL AND CERTIFIED MAIL

Andrea Almeida

ThePlanet.com Internet Services

1333 Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

        Re:  Notification of Copyright Infringement

Dear Ms. Almeida:

CLAIM OF TRADEMARK INFRINGEMENT

Website at issue:  www.abouthimalayangojijuice.com
<http://www.abouthimalayangojijuice.com> :

Website details: 

domain:             abouthimalayangojijuice.com
created:             18-Aug-2006
last-changed:          03-Nov-2006
registration-expiration:     18-Aug-2007

nserver:             ns141.hostgator.com 70.87.105.194
nserver:             ns142.hostgator.com 70.87.105.195

status:             CLIENT-TRANSFER-PROHIBITED

registrant-firstname:      Oneandone
registrant-lastname:       Private Registration
registrant-organization:     1&1 Internet, Inc. -
http://1and1.com/contact
registrant-street1:       701 Lee Road, Suite 300
registrant-street2:       ATTN: abouthimalayangojijuice.com
registrant-pcode:        19087
registrant-state:        PA
registrant-city:         Chesterbrook
registrant-ccode:        US
registrant-phone:        +1.8772064254
registrant-email:
<http://whois.domaintools.com/domain-privacy/> 

Server Data

Server Type:    SonataServer 4.7.11rc1 
IP Address:     70.87.105.194
<http://whois.domaintools.com/70.87.105.194>
<http://www.domaintools.com/reverse-ip/?hostname=70.87.105.194>
<http://dns-tools.domaintools.com/?m=ping&q=70.87.105.194>
<http://dns-tools.domaintools.com?m=dns&q=70.87.105.194>
<http://dns-tools.domaintools.com?m=traceroute&q=70.87.105.194>   
IP Location:    - Texas - Dallas - Theplanet.com Internet Services Inc 

 

FreeLife International, LLC ("FreeLife") owns registered trademarks for
FREELIFE and HIMALAYAN GOJI.  FreeLife sells health and wellness
products, including its HIMALAYAN GOJI Juice.  We believe this website
infringes on our trademarks and copyrighted images and language and
causes confusion as to the source of the website and will lead the
unsuspecting public to access this website thinking it is directly
related to FreeLife.  This website also links to other infringing
websites. This website owner does not have license to use FreeLife
registered trademarks or copyrights on its website.   FreeLife's
registered trademarks at issue are:

HIMALAYAN GOJI

International Class: 005
Class Status: Active
Nutritional supplements, dietary supplements, and liquid dietary
supplements
First Use Date: 2003-10-10
First Use in Commerce Date: 2003-10-10

International Class: 032
Class Status: Active
Nutritionally fortified fruit-based beverages; sports drinks
First Use Date: 2003-10-10
First Use in Commerce Date: 2003-10-10

 

FREELIFE

International Class: 029
Class Status: Active
Soy-based energy bars, ready-to-eat soy-based food bars, soy-based snack
foods, soy-based and vegetable-based food beverages, proteins for use as
food additives, potato-based snack foods, fruit-based snack foods,
candied fruit snacks and processed edible seeds

First Use Date: 1995-03-01
First Use in Commerce Date: 1995-03-01

 

FREELIFE

International Class: 005
Class Status: Active
nutritional supplements; dietary supplements; nutritional beverages,
shakes, juices, drink mixes and shake mixes for use as dietary
supplements and meal replacements; ready-to-eat nutritional food bars
and cookies for use as dietary supplements and meal replacements
containing vitamins, minerals, high potency complex carbohydrates, fiber
and protein complexes; ingredients, namely, organic and inorganic
proteins, lipids and carbohydrates sold as an integral component of
nutritional and dietary supplements; vitamins, minerals, antioxidants,
botanical extracts, phytochemicals, phytonutrients, metabolic
activators, bioavailability enhancers, probiotics, plant enzymes and
coenzymes, herbs and herbal extracts, and soy nutrients, all for use as
dietary supplements; first aid cream, medicated acne cream and pain
relief cream
First Use Date: 1995-02-12
First Use in Commerce Date: 1995-02-12

FREELIFE

International Class: 030
Class Status: Active
herbal food beverages, grain-based food beverages and shakes
First Use Date: 2003-10-10
First Use in Commerce Date: 2003-10-10

FREELIFE INTERNATIONAL

International Class:  005.

Class Status: Active 

nutritional supplements, namely vitamins, minerals, nutritional
beverages, nutritional food bars and nutritional cookies. 

First Use Date: 1995-02-12 

First Use in Commerce Date: 1995-02-12 

International Class: 042. 

Class Status: Active

wholesale distributorship services and network marketing distributorship
services in the field of nutritional supplements. 

First Use Date: 1995-02-12. 

First Use in Commerce Date: 1995-02-12

 

Upon good faith and belief, the information in this notification is
accurate, and under penalty of perjury, the Complaining Party has
exclusive rights in the ownership of the trademarks listed above.

Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions or
comments.

Very truly yours,

 

Christopher A. Reid

General Counsel

FreeLife International 

E-mail: trademarkadmin@freelife.com

Phone: 602-333-4820 Fax: 602-333-4759

 

This electronic mail transmission and any attachments are confidential,
may be privileged, and may be subject to copyright owned by FreeLife
International, Inc. They should be read or retained only by the intended
recipient. If you have received this transmission in error, you are
hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution, copying, or action
taken in relation to the contents of and attachments to this electronic
mail transmission is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful. Please
notify the sender immediately and permanently delete the transmission
from your system. Thank you.
